mapper.select: SELECT id, dateid, name, plusyear, plusmonth, plusday FROM DateTable WHERE id = #{id}
SELECT id, dateid, name, plusyear, plusmonth, plusday FROM DateTable
mapper.insert: INSERT into DateTable ( dateid, name, plusyear, plusmonth, plusday ) VALUES ( #{dateid}, #{name}, #{plusyear}, #{plusmonth}, #{plusday} )
mapper.update: UPDATE DateTable SET dateid = #{dateid}, name = #{name}, plusyear = #{plusyear}, plusmonth = #{plusmonth}, plusday = #{plusday} WHERE id = #{id}
